Headline: Full Stack Engineer at Locatelli Advogados
Summary: I am a Computer Engineer and I have been working with web programming since 2010. Lately, building stuff from scratch using Node.js, Vue.js, PostgreSQL and GraphQL for Locatelli tax lawyers in São Paulo, Brazil. Before that I spent 4 years in Germany, working with React and Angular. Earlier, I have been through fields such as Investment Banking, Education, Advertising (with some coordination experience), Financial Market (with some full-stack experience) and software development (with some design experience).
